FRAGUAB.MX.summary: Corporativo Fragua, S.A.B. de C.V. operates pharmacy stores under the Superfarmacia name in Mexico. Its stores offer medicines, perfumery, photography, home, food, fruits and vegetables, bakery, sausage, and others. The company is also involved in the processing and sale of photographic equipment; and provides cargo services. Corporativo Fragua, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1942 and is based in Guadalajara, Mexico.
